section.title: &kw-hos-tm; &kw-hos-version-50;: Ceilometer Metering Available Meter Types
section.para: The Metering service contains three types of meters:

listitem.para: A cumulative meter measures data over time (for example, instance hours).
A gauge measures discrete items (for example, floating IPs or image uploads) or fluctuating values (such as disk input or output).
A delta measures change over time, for example, monitoring bandwidth.

section.para: Each meter is populated from one or more samples, which are gathered from the messaging queue (listening agent), polling agents, or push agents. Samples are populated by counter objects.
Each counter contains the following fields:

listitem.para: the type of meter (cumulative, gauge, or delta)
the project the resource is assigned to
the user the resource is assigned to.

section.para: Note: The metering service shares the same High-availability proxy, messaging, and database clusters with the other Information services. To avoid unnecessarily high loads, .
